Privacy, Selfishness, and the Internet Commons: Time to Stop Opting Out

stories.text:
Just trying to gauge interest in a platform for long-form discourse. Wherein people can write an essay on a particular topic, and others can refute or support by writing an essay in response.

HackerNews discussion is great, but sometimes I wish the discourse could be more fleshed out.

I imagine trolling and spam would be minimal, since it is high-effort.
stories.title: Ask HN: Platform for long form discourse?
Many Omicron cases in fully vaccinated students

stories.text: Just curious, checking out Pixelfed as an Instagram alternative for somebody that needs to share images regularly. Trying to become more educated on Mastodon generally. Not sure I really have an opinion yet. Apologies in advance for the broad question.
